title: How to disable screen flash during screenshot on Pixel 3a? It's obnoxiously bright and unnecessary!
content:
As the title says really. I take a screenshot and the screen flashes white, hurting my eyes especially in low light. I would like to disable the flash as feel it's unnecessary or the function. Coming from an iPhone which didn't flash on screenshot and given it pops up to alert you a screenshot was taken, and the fact I have to hold power and tap screenshot button for it to happen, it's not like I really need another visual alert that I've taken a screenshot! 

Is there an option to disable the flash on screen?

Thanks :)
